item.description:
Let's meet at Cambridge Common, located near Harvard Square on Mass Ave. Click here to see a map of where we play. BK will be organizing this event.

We'll meet at 4:00 on Saturday and throw the ball around while getting to know each others' names. After warming up we'll get a game going! Check our About Us page for a full list of game rules, group policies and rule modifications. At 6:30 or so we'll head over to UNO's to finish up with conversation over food/drinks.

For those who take public transportation, the Harvard Bus and T Station is a couple blocks away (see the map). A map of nearby metered locations can be found here. Send me a note if you have any questions!
item.name: Flag Football on Cambridge Common
